alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 12 at 8:16PM MST until February 13 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Toole and Liberty and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Period of most intense winds are expected from between 2 AM tomorrow morning through noon MST Monday.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
